techmeme.title: Xreal unveils Project Aura, expected to be the first Android XR glasses, powered by a separate puck with a Qualcomm chip, slated to launch by early 2026 (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Google debuts Search Live, which lets users tap a "Live" icon in AI Mode or Lens and then converse with Search about what's in their camera's field of view (Dominic Preston/The Verge)
Google unveils Gemini in Chrome, which initially works across just two tabs but will eventually support many and be agentic, for Google AI Pro and Ultra users (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Google will soon let users shop in AI Mode, unveils agentic checkout, and updates its virtual try-on feature in Search Labs for clothes shoppers in the US (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Google's AI Mode, its chatbot for Search, rolls out to everyone in the US and will include features like Deep Search, agentic capabilities, and chart generation (Igor Bonifacic/Engadget)
